text.title: Beginnzeit liegt nach der Endezeit , oder anderer Fehler bei Attributen begin= und end=

description.p: Fehlerhaft ist zum Beispiel <period begin="23:00" end="01:00"/>. Eine Periode muss innerhalb eines Kalendertages liegen, zwischen 00:00 und 24:00.

text.title: There is an error such as the start time set in the begin="" attribute is later than the end time set in end=""

description.p: An error results from, for example <period begin="23:00" end="01:00"/> as the start and end times must lie within the same day, i.e. between 00:00 und 24:00.

text.title: New

description.p: The web service has created a new order and handed it over to the job chain.

description.p: In a windows environment it is possible that files can not be deleted, because another process (e.g. a virus scanner) blocked them. JobScheduler try to delete files for a while and if it's failed you'll get the message SCHEDULER-878.
This behaviour should not be the normal case, but it is not excluded.
